33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdullah bin 'Amr narrated that the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) said:"There shall be a Fitnah of extermination of the 'Arabs. Its fighters are in the Fire. During it, the tongue is stronger then the sword

chapter.eng-name: About Restraining The Tongue During Fitnah
